pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:0.3: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:1.1: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:1.2: the nun Caṇḍakāḷī approached the Sangha of nuns and asked for approval to give the full admission.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:1.6: Soon afterwards the Sangha of nuns gave approval to other nuns to give the full admission.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:1.8: “So it seems I’m ignorant and shameless,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:1.9: since the Sangha gives approval to other nuns, but not to me.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:1.10: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:1.12: consent to not being approved to give the full admission, and then criticize it afterwards?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:1.13: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Caṇḍakāḷī did this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:1.18: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:1.19: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:1.20.1: ‘If a nun is told, “Venerable, you have given enough full admissions for now,” and she consents, saying, “Fine,” but then criticizes it afterwards, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:2.1.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:2.1.5: Venerable, you have given enough full admissions for now:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:2.1.6: Venerable, you have given enough full ordinations for now.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:2.1.7: If she consents, saying, ‘Fine,’ but then criticizes it afterwards, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:2.2.2: if she criticizes one who regularly acts from desire, ill will, confusion, or fear;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:2.2.4: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:2.2.5: The sixth training rule is finished.
